text:
TRAX RETAIL | San Francisco | Onsite

Trax is the leading provider of computer vision and analytics solutions for retail. We just raised $125M pre-IPO round: https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-07-01/warburg-p... and are growing quickly!

We are growing the Data Collection team in San Francisco, expanding our platform globally. Our mobile app EasyShift (https://appstore.com/easyshift) crowdsources the in-store data collection and pays out thousands of dollars every day to our community.

- Senior Back-End Ruby Engineer: https://www.traxretail.com/careers/engineering/A5.80F/backen... - Android Engineer: https://www.traxretail.com/careers/engineering/FC.704/mobile...

Tech Stack: Back-End: ● Ruby / Rails ● Elixir / Phoenix ● PostgreSQL ● RabbitMQ ● GraphQL Android: ● Java ● Kotlin ● RxJava ● Realm

Interested, questions? Apply on the above link or reach out directly to me: loicc [at] traxretail [dot] com
